data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 13315, Version Hash: fa8d1a877bc13f374d4663d2932a7b6d1daab0f9
data.actual_result: The person is still "attached" and listening along
data.expected_result: They should disconnect after the other person changes to something different.
data.short_description: Listening along on spotify via the discord Embed, when the host starts a "game" the other person is still listening.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start listening on Spotify - Send a Spotify Embed in a channel - Get someone to listen along - Start playing a game so the Spotify rich presences goes off your profile - The other person should still be listen along - Try skipping a song on shuffle or change to a different playlist or something - The other person should still be "attached" so they are still listening with you - Check the embed again and in the corner where you change to online/Idle/DnD etc, and see that the other person's profile picture isn't there and yet they are still listening along/
